run() - Method in class it.polimi.sw.GC50.net.socket.ServerSCK
method that waits for the connection of a client this method starts the server and waits the connection of a client it creates a new client handler for each client that connects and starts a new thread for each client handler the client handler is added to the list of clients the method prints a message when a client connects if an error occurs the method returns the method is an infinite loop
